post.body: ooh. I'll dm you details when I get a time, but right now that's the extent of the plans
January 9th at howl at the moon, friend me on facebook and I'll send you the invite :)
thanks! Welcome back to you in advance of the 4th!
to Raleigh for now, after that wherever I land a job :)
9th of Jan at howl at the moon, friend me on facebook and I'll send you the invite :)
moving my stuff back to Raleigh for now, tbd after that.
thanks :). It's a relief, but very bittersweet.
nope! I'm not one to plod along taking forever to do things :). Item crossed off checklist! Success!!
vacating my condo in charlotte, it's leased out in January so Im moving my stuff out today/tomorrow
indeed. Packing today? Not so good!
fun. Had a great time and as an added bonus, ran into tons of random people :)
thx! It appears my friends hang out there regularly.
temporary answer is yes. Laid off in Dec so I got out of my lease in CLT.
not really :) went to jackpot last night, haven't heard about Solas!
@nettap provided a bunch, and I know Dave Matthews uses Twitted, but don't think to expand the fan base. His tweets are unique
music artists? I can try to dig some up :)
My dad has never seen Top Gear, until tonight :). Verdict? Must DV-R at my parents house.
Packed up my place in 5ish hours with the kitchen help of my dad. Nice! Bit more to do but 95% done.
Running into 5 random people at the car I've never been to before? Apparently normal.
I'm at Jackpot (1303 Hillsborough St, Raleigh, NC) - http://bkite.com/03hbw
